title: Grateful Dead Live at Hartford Civic Center on 1980-05-10
source: flac16/48kHz; Cassette Audience Master recorded By Jim Wise (patched out of Jeff Hellman); Nakamichi CM-700 Electret Condenser Microphones w/ CP-4 Shotgun Capsules-Sony TC D-5 Cassette Recorder; Location @ Sound Board; Analog to Digital: Dolby B Decoded Maxell UD-XL11 C90 High-Bias(CrO2)Cassette Masters played back on Nakamichi Dragon-Korg MR-1000(DSF[1-bit 5.6448 MHz Stereo]) Korg Audio Gate-WAV[24/96] Transfer by David Minches; Editing(Adobe Audition CC)-Mastering(iZotope Ozone 6)-FLAC encoding(dBpoweramp)Tagging(Tag & Re-name)Sample Rate Conversions(r8brain); All Editing & Processing performed in the 24 bit digital domain By Jim Wise
